# happifndata

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://lifecycle.r-lib.org/articles/stages.html#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of happifndata is to store data for [happifn](https://github.com/paul-carteron/happifn) package.

## Installation

You can install the development version of happifndata like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("https://github.com/paul-carteron/happifn")
```
